short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will autobuy your product on just a single click event.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi, we back with another amazon tool, This one is little simple, in which you can just buy your product with a single click.

Feel free to write your thoughts on this tool.
Thanks!!
